9struct Stream {
10 int index;
11 Device device;
12 explicit Stream(int index, Device device) : index(index), device(device) {}
13};
14
16Stream default_stream(Device d);
17
19void set_default_stream(Stream s);
20
22Stream new_stream(Device d);
23
24inline bool operator==(const Stream& lhs, const Stream& rhs) {
25 return lhs.index == rhs.index;
26}
27
28inline bool operator!=(const Stream& lhs, const Stream& rhs) {
29 return !(lhs == rhs);
30}
